messages.message:
Hey, I can donate some money. I was also planning on bringing a lot of alcohol, and if you don't mind, some cool colored jello shots in the most science-y containers I can find. I've also been working on recipes for drunken gummy bears, so if you want I can make a huge batch of those. I know they make cool gummy shapes like worms/bugs/other things which might kind of fit with the science theme. 

Let me know if you're okay with that.

-Meaghan

Brian
Sounds great!  Actually if you mix jello with tonic water instead of regular water it reacts to black light!  So definitely try that if you haven't already made them.  And even a 5 dollar donate helps, Leah and I spent a ton of money and we are working out some experiments for the party, it should be pretty amazing!
I would like the Western Digital Promo code please. KTHXBAI.

Brian
EMCLWNS37

Only 12 hours left, enter the code in the cart area and you should see the discounts below the drive.
saturday sounds great

Brian
https://www.facebook.com/NeonFestival
nice

Brian
Couldn't find anyone to go with me
it's tonight?
when?

Brian
9
or 8
I wasn't going to be there until 9

Brian
I wasn't going to be there until 9
I'm not off of work until 10

Brian
Or in the same city

it says it's in Phoenix
whoever set up this page needs to learn how to make it easy to find event information
I live in Phoenix.

Brian
oh
want to come after work?

nah, I'm going to pass
thanks for the offer, though

Brian
Yeah, pretty much the same response I got from everyone else I've asked.
It looks neat, but I just did a ten hour shift and I have dinner plans

Brian
!
hi

Brian
hows life?

decent
I managed to pay all the bills, so I'm doing something right
how are you?

Brian
that's good!
so how are things with you?

Brian
swell
that's good

Brian
yeah
been going to UK Thursdays
on Mill Ave
it's so bro

that's cool
I bought a puppy and he took up all of my drinking money
I hope to have it replenished next month

Brian
sweet
but it's okay, because my puppy rocks.

Brian
I might want a cat
You were so good with Squash, you should get a cat!!

Brian
coming to my party Wednesday?

I don't have any money to spend on a sales party.
I can't afford to turn my heat on, let alone buy luxury hotel items
sorry

Brian
they are luxury hotel items at a low, consumer price
and there will be wine and cheese
also, I get off of work at 8:30 on wednesday, and it will take me about 35 minutes to get from work to your apartment

Brian
and possibly sandwiches.
oh yeah, it will probably be over by then.

yeah...
my schedule these days isn't conducive to going out on weekdays, but working the late shift comes with a 50 cent pay increase.
also, no traffic so I spend less on gas.

Brian
yeah, that's good
sorry, I'd really love to, it'd be nice to see everyone again

Brian
yeah
how did you get into this whole PQ thing?

Brian
my mom does it.
and I've met some new people since moving here.

Brian
Hi

hi
how are you?

Brian
I'm good.
You?

I'm good
so what have you been up to?
okay, I'm going to go. later.
